TITLE: Episode 107 - The Examined Life with Nick Pecone [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined again by our good friend Nick Pecone. Nick spent time in college studying philosophy. When he has come across our episodes on postmodernism and other philosophies, he has some details and ideas that he wants to add to the conversation. Join us as we hit that and any number of other topics.
